text: L'Aventurier (The Adventurer) is the debut studio album of Indochine, a French pop rock band, released in 1982. The title itself "L'Aventurier" was a huge success during the same year, becoming one of the band's classic songs. at www.indo-chine.orgThe title track won the "Song of the Summer" of 1982 in France, while the disc itself also won the "Bus D'Acier" award for 1983. ==Track listing== # L'Aventurier \- 3.53 # L'Opportuniste \- 2.26 # Leila \- 3.56 # Docteur Love \- 2.32 # Indochine (Les 7 Jours De Pékin) \- 2.24 # Dizzidence Politik \- 4.21 # Françoise (Qu'est-ce qui t'as pris?) \- 2.36 == References == Category:1982 debut albums Category:Indochine (band) albums
title: L'Aventurier
